dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.memento

Class AbstractMementoFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.memento.AbstractMementoFactory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultMementoFactory

    public abstract class AbstractMementoFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    The IMementoFactory is used via the AbstractBackend to create the data model of the wizard.

    The data model of the wizard consists of a tree of mementos. Each memento has a textual id, a list of tag-value attributes and may have child mementos.

    Mementos can be subclassed to support more complex data structures. To get subclassed mementos or to fill mementos with default values an own MementoFactory can be supplied by the AbstractBackend.

    By default the AbstractBackend provides an instance if the DefaultMementoFactory.

    Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

    Since:
    2008.b

    • Method Detail

      • getRootMemento

        public Memento getRootMemento(java.lang.String id)
        Get a root memento with a specific id.

        This default implementation calls getMemento( null, id ); and issues a fatal error if null is returned.

        Parameters:
        id - The id of the root memento
        Returns:
        The root memento
        Since:
        2008.b

      • getMemento

        public Memento getMemento(Memento parent,
                          java.lang.String id)
        Instantiates a new memento.

        This default implementation returns getMemento( id, this );. You can override this method to return you own memento implementation or to set default values.

        Parameters:
        parent - The parent memento
        id - The memento-id of the new memento
        Returns:
        The new memento
        Since:
        2008.b

      • resetToDefault

        public void resetToDefault(Memento memento,
                           java.lang.String attributeId,
                           java.lang.String proposedDefaultValue)
        This method is used to reset the value of a memento to ist default value.

        The default implementation sets the proposed default value if one is given

        This functionality is currently unused.

        Parameters:
        memento - The memento of which to reset attributes
        attributeId - The attribute to change
        proposedDefaultValue - A value proposed by the GUI (lay be null)
        Since:
        2008.b
